claim: Christopher Lee was a film actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Sir Christopher Frank Carandini Lee  (  27 May 1922 -- 7 June 2015  )  was an English character actor , singer , and author .

claim: Christopher Lee was a film actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: With a career spanning nearly 70 years , Lee initially portrayed villains and became best known for his role as Count Dracula in a sequence of Hammer Horror films .

claim: Christopher Lee was a film actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: His other film roles include Francisco Scaramanga in the James Bond film The Man with the Golden Gun  (  1974  )  , Saruman in The Lord of the Rings film trilogy  (  2001 -- 2003  )  and The Hobbit film trilogy  (  2012 -- 2014  )  , and Count Dooku in the second and third films of the Star Wars prequel trilogy  (  2002 and 2005  )  .

claim: Christopher Lee was a film actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Lee was knighted for services to drama and charity in 2009 , received the BAFTA Fellowship in 2011 , and received the BFI Fellowship in 2013 .

claim: Christopher Lee was a film actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Lee considered his best performance to be that of Pakistan 's founder Muhammad Ali Jinnah in the biopic Jinnah  (  1998  )  , and his best film to be the British horror film The Wicker Man  (  1973  )  .

claim: Christopher Lee was a film actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He frequently appeared opposite Peter Cushing in Hammer Horror films , and late in his career had roles in six Tim Burton films .

claim: Christopher Lee was a film actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Always noted as an actor for his deep , strong voice , Lee was also known for his singing ability , recording various opera and musical pieces between 1986 and 1998 , and the symphonic metal album Charlemagne : By the Sword and the Cross in 2010 , after having worked with several metal bands since 2005 .

claim: Christopher Lee was a film actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The heavy metal follow-up Charlemagne : The Omens of Death was released on 27 May 2013 , Lee 's 91st birthday .

claim: Christopher Lee was a film actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He was honoured with the `` Spirit of Metal '' award at the 2010 Metal Hammer Golden Gods Awards ceremony .

claim: Christopher Lee was a film actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Lee died from complications of respiratory problems and heart failure on the morning of 7 June 2015 , at the age of 93 .

claim: Christopher Lee was a film actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Christopher Lee Meng Soon  (  born 23 July 1971  )  is a Malaysian Singapore-based actor , host and singer .

premise_source_doc_sentence: Christopher Lee  (  1922 -- 2015  )  was an English actor and singer .

claim: Christopher Lee was a film actor.
